answer:
In both Canada and the USA the 2018-2019, trivalent (three-component) vaccines protect against:

		A/Michigan/45/2015 (H1N1)pdm09-like virus

		A/Singapore/INFIMH-16-0019/2016 A(H3N2)-like virus 

		B/Colorado/06/2017-like (Victoria lineage) virus
In BC, influenza vaccines are generally available starting in October. Find clinics near you on our influenza clinic locator.  Contact the clinic of your choosing directly to ask about drop-ins and/or appointments before you leave.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In both Canada and the USA the 2018-2019, trivalent (three-component) vaccines protect against:

## A/Michigan/45/2015 (H1N1)pdm09-like virus

		A/Singapore/INFIMH-16-0019/2016 A(H3N2)-like virus 

		B/Colorado/06/2017-like (Victoria lineage) virus
In BC, influenza vaccines are generally available starting in October.

Find clinics near you on our influenza clinic locator.
Contact the clinic of your choosing directly to ask about drop-ins and/or appointments before you leave.
Immunization Nurse
question: I am a senior snowbird travelling to Southern California at the end of October. Should I have my flu shot here before I leave or down in California.Are the strains different?
question_variation_0: where to get flu shot before i travel
question_variation_1: do I need to have your flu shot before traveling to southern california?
question_variation_2: do I need my flu shot before I leave for california
